== Introduction ==
Rémi, aka FireWave, is an Ubuntu evangelist since  now a totally converted Ubuntu user since October 2005. You may find him hanging around in #ubuntu-ca and #ubuntu-fr amongst other channels.

== Background ==
Rémi comes from Paris, France, where he was born in 1985. But now he lives in Montreal, QC. He made his first programm at 8 years on a old 486-DX33, and starts play on Linux with the old RedHat5.2.

== Open Source ==
Rémi had mostly support the i8n french traduction of the Gnome Project.
